questions.quote: Jerry, a gift not enjoyed is like a flower that doesn't blossom.
Another productive meeting. By the way, I saw that English Patient film last night. It was extraordinary.
Right, well I'm sorry, all right. I guess I was just thinking of myself.
Look, I don't like people talking about my shoes behind my back, okay? My shoes are my business. The two of you shouldn't have been looking at some fifteen year-old's cleavage anyway!
What?! They're stealing the name?! That's my name, I made it up!
Huh. Well, it all sounds pretty good. There's only one flaw in it: They're roommates. She'd have to go out with me behind Sandy's back. She's not gonna do that.
Now my sense of it is that you're probably wasting time working piecemeal, first cleaning one area, then another.
Jerry, it's Sharon from NYU. I'm just calling to tell you that I'm not going to play up that angle we talked about and I'm sorry.
Nine hundred. Do I hear a thousand? Ladies, he is a Harvard graduate.
So Sherry, what do you remember about that day at the library?
